summary:
Makes Hair,Mouth and scars HD
Plus maybe some extra stuff
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/76318-0-1479671950.jpg[/img]

[b]PLEASE READ FIRST[/b]:

This mod would not be possible if not for Nexus user KrittaKitty's feather texture.
So please give her some credit, for her amazing work.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]REQUESTS:[/b]

Some user have might been using the intense color feather file or
the facial horn color match, and yes i know that i removed them.
But if you want me to remake those kinda files, then just tell me in the comments.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]FOR SSE PLAYERS[/b]:

Yes this mod should be compatible with SSE.
But I will probaly port it to SSE NEXUS, we will see.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]UPDATE!!!
[/b]
Okay now my eye mod is finally ready to be released
so here it is Argonian eyes HD.

They have totaly remade them with natural realistic reptile eyes
I used pictures of frogs,crocodiles,aligators snapping turtles,whales, fish and Iguanas
to make them.

I have uploaded pictures of them all for both genders. 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 2.0 of this overhaul includes new diffuse map updates,
better specular maps, and and upgraded normal maps.

This overhaul includes following mods:

HD Argonian Hairstyles 2.0
(Which changes both male and female Argonian hairstyles, like horns,feathers rings/jewlery)

HD Argonian Mouth 2.0
(which makes teeth,mouth and tongue much more realistic)

HD Argonian scars 2.0
(Now In 2 styles, there is a flesh wound and a more scar looking version (which was requested by Nexus user [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8185401]Novem99[/url])
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Now for the fixer[/b]

 1.0 No more plastic coated argonians (Vanilla Edition)
(I have also made a specular map fix for the vanilla argonian textures, for those who dont uses other argonian reskins.
will not be compatible with other argonian reskins!.)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Optionals[/b]

1.0 I have been looking for HD 2k tintmasks for Argonians and i also found some except for the nostrils tintmask, so i decided to make one myself.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Q/A

 Q: What textures are you using on the argonians in the pictures?

 A: ChaserTechs Dragonic argonians

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75826/?

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76127/?
